import { IonCol, IonContent, IonFooter, IonGrid, IonHeader, IonItem, IonLabel, IonPage, IonRouterLink, IonRow, IonTitle, IonToggle, IonToolbar } from '@ionic/react'; import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../css/Global.css'; import '../css/Settings.css'; import TopNav from '../components/TopNav'; const Settings: React.FC = () => { const [announcementAlertChecked, setAnnouncementAlertChecked] = useState(false); const [openHouseRemindersChecked, setOpenHouseRemindersChecked] = useState(false); return ( {/* Announcement Alerts */} Announcement Alerts setAnnouncementAlertChecked(e.detail.checked)}> {announcementAlertChecked ? Toggle to disable alerts for important announcements during the Open House : ( Toggle to enable alerts for important announcements during the Open House ) } {/* Open House Reminders */} Open House Programmes Reminders setOpenHouseRemindersChecked(e.detail.checked)}> {openHouseRemindersChecked ? Toggle to disable reminders for open house programmes you have added to your personal scheduler : ( Toggle to enable reminders for open house programmes you have added to your personal scheduler ) } {/* SIM Open House Website */} SIM Open House Website App Version: 2020.8
Designed & Developed By FYP-20-S3-13 ); }; export default Settings;
